dcterms:creator: S. Yuan
Q. Ye
B. Stenger
S. Jain
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: A large and diverse dataset for 3D hand pose estimation, composed of parts of the BigHand 2.2M dataset and the First-person Hand Action Dataset (FHAD). It contains 957,032 depth images of five different hands in the training set and 295,510 images of ten different hands in the test set.
dcterms:title: Hands 2017 Challenge Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Tompson
M. Stein
Y. Lecun
K. Perlin
dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating 3D hand pose estimation methods, containing 72,757 training images and 8,252 test images. The dataset includes annotations for 36 hand joints and is used for benchmarking hand pose estimation techniques.
dcterms:title: NYU Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Yuan
Q. Ye
B. Stenger
S. Jain
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing 2.2 million hand images for evaluating hand pose estimation methods. It is part of the Hands 2017 challenge dataset.
dcterms:title: BigHand 2.2M Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: A dataset containing RGB-D videos and 3D hand pose annotations for evaluating first-person hand action recognition and tracking methods. It is part of the Hands 2017 challenge dataset.
dcterms:title: First-person Hand Action Dataset (FHAD)
